source.352d17b4:
### The Grandmasters (GMs)
[Grandmaster (GM)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grandmaster_(chess)) is a title awarded to chess players by the world chess organization [International Chess Federation (FIDE)](https://www.fide.com/)
source.1fccbdc3: #### We will perform EDA for the [Top Women Chess Players](https://www.kaggle.com/vikasojha98/top-women-chess-players) dataset.
source.c9cfefc8:
* **Judit Plogar** is the highest rated female player with Standard Rating of 2675. She has retired from chess though. 
* **Hou Yifan** is the highest rated active female player with Standard Rating of 2658.
